subject: Scheduled System Maintenance - August 5th
body:
Hi Alex,

This is a reminder that we have scheduled system maintenance on Monday, August 5th from 1:00 AM to 4:00 AM EST.

Affected systems:
- Email servers
- CRM database
- Marketing automation tools
- File sharing platforms

Please ensure any critical work is completed before 1:00 AM or plan accordingly. All systems should be fully operational by 4:00 AM.

If you have any urgent concerns, please reach out before the maintenance window.

Thanks,
David
IT Operations Team
